metadata.title: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin Wealth Falls By $41 Billion, Now Poorer Than Bill Gates
metadata.description: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin-based net worth took a heavy hit as BTC dropped more than 30% from its all-time high set in October.
metadata.keywords: Satoshi Nakamoto, Bitcoin, Forbes billionaires list, Bill Gates, Arkham Intelligence, net worth
